item.title: What do i use to put code in for curse-scape server 127.0.0.1?
item.dc:creator: @Unholy_Angel Unholy Angel
item.description:
@Unholy_Angel wrote:

The server: 127.0.0.1 is the single-player IP for offline play. To get curse-cape, you have to download the server source - a topic containing heaps of server sources is around this forum somewhere…

Read full topic
